name: Super Blocks (Scaryfish) (Scaryfish)
description:
I made this because I made a much worse version when I was learning how to use unity, so I decided to remake it but better. I tried to capture some of the essence of the weekend's music and some glossy bright colors. I think I got what I was looking for. I used some free music from Free stock music .com but I don't want to get sued so here are the credits
